website_summaries.verdict: It's a solid option if you are looking for a rugged stool in a decorative design; otherwise the Boraam stools are more versatile and affordable.
pros: Features a unique design with a rich bronze finish and swivel motion
Has a spacious, soft upholstered seat that accommodates larger individuals
cons: The design may be a bit bulky for smaller spaces, and you get one stool for the price

website_summaries.verdict: An ornate and attractive bar stool with swivel seat. Highly functional and very well-constructed.
pros: We love the easy-to-clean faux leather upholstery
Stands out for its attractive retro design
Minor assembly required but it's very straightforward with all parts and tools included
cons: Not ideal for outdoor use, as faux leather will peel in certain conditions

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Great Seller !!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful barstools. Shipped in no time, easy to assemble, and no missing parts. Customer service went miles out of their way to solve a problem we had. Highly recommend any products from this company/seller !!!
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo

customer_reviews.title: Extra tall, sturdy, comfortable and attractive stools.
customer_reviews.text: These stools are very attractive and high quality. They arrived well packaged in heavy duty boxes. There were no missing parts, no damaged pieces and the assembly instructions were easy to follow. I managed the assembly by myself, but it would have been easier and faster with a second set of hands. The stools are roomy, comfortable and very attractive. They measure 34" from the floor to the top of the cushion, which unfortunately makes them too high for their original intent. I liked them so much that I decided to find another use for them and have since purchased other stools to fit my table. I recommend these to anyone who can use a taller bar stool.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Stowers

customer_reviews.title: No Regrets!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chairs! I wouldnt call them bar stools. I only wish the seat cusions were brown instead of the orangish tan color but they still look good next to my brown granite. Took about 10 min to put together. These chairs are well worth the money. You wont be disappointed at all. If your 5'5 or 6'5 you will fit comfortablity in them.
customer_reviews.author: Ty C

customer_reviews.title: Good looking sturdy well made chair.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 8 chairs. Quality product. Delivered on time. Packaging was good, all parts were included and in A1 condition. I am a female, almost 75, and was able to put all the chairs together by myself with no problems. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce E. Bosse

customer_reviews.title: Powell Barstool
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be more pleased with the stool. I ordered only one to begin with because I wanted to be sure it would hold up to my BIG and TALL man. I was not disappointed.... Not only was the barstool big and beautiful; it was an excellent quality product that I forsee having no problem withstanding years enjoyment. It comes with the tools needed for assembly and every part is labled. One person could do it all, but with two people this product is a snap to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Jjohnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice but had some issues
customer_reviews.text: First of all these chairs are way too tall for my counter. Secondly one of the chairs had a small rip in the cushion that I didn't notice until after it was assembled. If it wasn't so bulky and hard to take apart I would send it back. They are beautiful chairs and I have no issues with that. This is one reason I still prefer the old fashioned way of buying things by getting in the car and going to the store so I can see the product before I purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: hoosiergman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Bar Stools
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these for our breakfast bar and love them. They are of good quality and an amazing price. Moreover, they fit my husband who is 6'5 and aren't too high for me at 5' 3. It is very difficult to find barstools that will accommodate a higher weight. I'm very thankful we found these.
customer_reviews.author: KJS

customer_reviews.title: They look great, but are a terrible headache to install
customer_reviews.text: They look great, but are a terrible headache to install, especially if you're doing it by yourself. You'll work up a sweat for sure, it'll take you at least 45 minutes or an hour, and it's very cumbersome trying to use their tiny allen wrenches because they're always slipping and you'll be dropping screws the entire time. Other than that, they're very sturdy and look great. Still a 5 star product, just hire someone to put them together for you.
customer_reviews.author: mrTom

customer_reviews.title: I was pleased with the heaviness of this chair
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was pleased with the heaviness of this chair. We ordered two of the tall size. After assembling just the stool part of the first one, we discovered they sent the wrong size legs. They sent the shorter one. Ok. that can be fixed I am thinking, just send the right legs. Then after trying to install the back on both seats, we discovered that the holes drilled into the seat did not match with the brackets on the high back. There is no way to install the back. After a call to the company, I left a message and there was no return call. SO we are forced to send back as unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: More beautiful than I imagined! !
customer_reviews.text: When I say these chairs are beautiful, I mean magnificent! I love these bar stools/chairs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We love these barstools! We found ones that costs triple what we paid and they were not this gorgeous or well built. They are comfortable and very sturdy. We left the arms off one so our 7yr old could climb in and out and even without the arms it looks great. Only warning I would give is these are very tall and big. Make sure you have the correct counter height and enough space to fit them in on your counter.
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: look good at my bar height countertop
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 stools for my kitchen counter. The hight is perfect. The size is great for larger people. Assembly was a little difficult because I had to use a lot of pressure to make the last leg connect and the arms to get bolted down. I suggest using a pair of pliers or socket wrench to hold the bolts while assembling. The little wrench supplied is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. I weigh 265 and these stools don't even notice the weight. The instructions are fairly easy to follow. The stools are not complicated to assemble but do require about an hour. I was impressed with the fact the parts included locknuts where nuts were used, and thread lock was applied to bolts that screwed into the stools. It's been a couple of weeks and nothing has come loose yet.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Truth

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews before assembling or at least mine
customer_reviews.text: The spanner wrench that is included is for holding the nut while you screw the bolt into it.. it works, however I found using a small pair of vice grips (see picture) works better. I read one review where someone thought they received the wrong nuts and went out and bought bigger ones. Not good. The smaller ones are used which makes it harder for them to fall off. Again..you will need that spanner wrench to hold them in place while you screw the bolts in. Plan on someone helping you assemble it..much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and appearance.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly is straightforward and just a bit tedious. It is helpful to have an assistant to sort and put together the various screws, washers, lock washers, machine screws and nuts combinations. Assemble components loosely and tighten down only after all fasteners for a component have had their threads started. If you're assembling more than one (we ordered and assembled five), it's really a timesaver to have a 1/4 inch drive set screwdriver with the correct Allen wrench tip. Everything was perfect except that the threads (SAE 1/4 x 20) for an adjustable tip on one of the legs needed to be chased; might have been able to force it instead, but preferred to not risk damaging it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Kolbay

customer_reviews.title: Arms don't line up to chair base and back of chair
customer_reviews.text: I put together the entire bottom of the chair,put on the back (only one place to put it so it lines up) and the arms don't even come close to lining up, like 2 inches off, could force it at awkward angle but not able to get all screws in and obviously thats not how its meant to be. Looks like others have had this issue, poor QC. Otherwise I like how they look and they seem sturdy (base at least, not sure about back/arms). They are big, but I knew that going in.
customer_reviews.author: Chitownburbs

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately had to send one back due to a defect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these -- supposedly exactly the same -- and was surprised to find that they were delivered in two very different types of boxes. After two hours of putting one together I discovered in the final step that the holes were drilled wrong and the arm rest would be impossible to attach on one side. I've ordered another but wasted two hours on this one. Make sure before putting it together that once you place the back on the arm rests will line up right. Hopefully this will save you hours of wasted time. Since the boxes didn't match I wonder if it had been returned previously.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Worth it if you have the space for them.
customer_reviews.text: Be warned... the chairs are very large. They are sturdy and attractive but will take up a decent amount of space in your home. As far as assembly is concerned, they are not difficult, but are time consuming and have a few points where two people are recommended. One of the chairs had an armrest that did not align with the back of the chair. I had to gently hammer it into a better position, before it could be attached. I paid $87 per chair which I consider a bargain especially with free shipping. The chairs don't rotate well- very stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Campbell

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: these stools are perfect for our raised bar, very comfortable. the assembly took a some effort but no complaints there. The older ppl in my family feel comfortable getting in & out of the stool. over all we love them & would recommend for purchase. the company was great working with us because we initially purchased the wrong size & there was NO issue getting them returned. Thank you they look great in our remodeled kitchen!!!!
customer_reviews.author: qiana

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful bar stools(I purchased 4). The last one that arrived yesterday had scratches on the base and are very concerning. I don’t want to return however I’m disappointed that it was packed very well but the shipping company must’ve thrown it down quite a few times. I understand it’s heavy but to be able to puncture the cardboard and surrounding styrofoam etc is quite a bit of abuse!
customer_reviews.author: Musicflora

customer_reviews.title: Comes COMPLETELY UNASSEMBLED... DID I SAY COMPLETELY UNASSEMBLED!
customer_reviews.text: Way too tall for a kitch counter island or bar. Bottom of the seat comes level with the countertop. Also comes COMPLETELY UNASSEMBLED... DID I SAY 💭 COMPLETELY UNASSEMBLED! Most come with the legs assembled and you attach the chair to the bottom legs... not this... COMPLETELY UNASSEMBLED. Returned both but at 40lbs and in an award box it was a hassle to get it to UPS. Had to pay return shipping for two 40lb chairs.
customer_reviews.author: R Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Mssing parts on 3/3 chairs. Misleading capacity
customer_reviews.text: Item described as 400# capacity on Amazon. Paperwork in box says do not exceed 275#. Card on chair says TESTED to 400#. No body in our house weighs closee to 400# but we have 250# people who like to have kids sit on our laps. So what is safe? Bought 3 chairs and EVERY one had small parts missing. Couple lock washers here. 2 flat washers on one. a nut on another. Just discouraging
customer_reviews.author: rab2897

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable bar stools
customer_reviews.text: These bar stools not only look great but have a very comfortable padded seat. My only negative comment to add is that the swivel feature of the stools is very tight and so far, I've not found a way to make them swivel smoother. I've tried WD40 but it's impossible to get it sprayed into the area and it only hits the outside edge and can't get to the mechanism itself.
customer_reviews.author: swaite

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair, full sized, comfortable seat, nice swivel, solid footrest. Asked my 19yo daughter to assemble and she had a bit of trouble, some holes not were not aligned nicely and she lacked the strength to right this, her father made it look simple. Armrests and an attractive sturdy back make this an easy chair to relax in, no worries about tipping off the edge..
customer_reviews.author: Crusanne

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are really nice, they look good & the seats are wide. I was a little frustrated because I had one screw that wouldn’t fit the nut so I had to go to Home Depot to find a something similar. Do not tighten the screws until all screws for each chair are in. Also the levelers under the legs do not have felt. So if you have wood or tile floors, make sure you buy some felt pads. But overall nice chairs.
customer_reviews.author: O. McGhee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Barstools
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs. I already have six of them but felt one more would be better. I have counter height stools and this was a tall stool and I didn't know that, but in can get shorter legs and it will be great. I love the copper tooling...it looks hand done and they are super comfortable and almost feel like a piece of furniture, but not too bulky. I like the foot rests and arm rests too. Great addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: karen wells

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair, tall...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chair, I fit it in nicely at 6'2' though it is a little big at my bar...like other reviewers have said, it takes at least an hour to assemble - I bought two so hopefully the second one goes as smooth though I anticipate it taking about the same time, lots of nuts and bolts to fasten. Instructions are laid out pretty simple - parts are well marked and hardware nicely marked and separated in bags. Extremely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Still it is beautiful. I am 5'6 133lbs and she is 5'4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Stunning Chairs. I didn't realize just how big and tall it is as my wife and I are quite petite people. Still it is beautiful. I am 5'6 133lbs and she is 5'4 95lbs and we could probably sit on one together although squished
customer_reviews.author: SnoopyCool

customer_reviews.title: Not even close!
customer_reviews.text: Just took one out of the box. Extremely upset! The written description is BRONZE color the PICTURE IS A BRONZE color. What I received is a flat BROWN not even close. I had hired someone to assemble due to my disability. I sent them away. Do you have what's described and pictured? I want someone to contact me ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: A.R. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Good looking barstool and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this barstool today. was a breeze to assemble and I'm not good at following instructions! So if this 60 year old klutz can put it together anybody can. The quality is wonderful and it looks really nice. I am ordering another one soon. Oh and it's very comfortable to sit on even for this plus sized person. Granddaughter gave it a two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Mango Momma

customer_reviews.title: Such a great stool - heavy duty, functional, beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: This is a shockingly beautiful stool, heavy duty and functional. The swivel squeaked a little, solved with a small squirt of WD40. Everything is super sturdy and comfortable, and I'm a big guy. Excellent stool.
customer_reviews.author: PghDrake

customer_reviews.title: Product Description Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Product Description misleading 400 pound weight support on line but paperwork says 275
customer_reviews.author: Jim Disney

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy, stable
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. I wouldn't buy it again. It is sturdy, stable, and the back is comfortable but here are some issues: 1) The seat is not very comfortable. I shouldn't have to put an extra cushion on top of it. 2) The arms are not very comfortable and they are kind of dangerous, the sides are thin and kinda sharp, I cut my elbow on em. 3) The seat takes a lot of effort to rotate. It doesn't have good ball bearings perhaps. 4) If you intend to move the chair around a lot just note that it is quite heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Good big guy's stool
customer_reviews.text: It is large and a large person can fit in it well. The recipient is over 6' and it is scaled for him just fine. On the other hand, a small, short person would find this stool too large. The recipient is very happy with the stool. It is also sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonista

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bar stools! Big and tall... yes! Takes up more space than I thought but still perfect. Heavy. They dont swivel too easily but that’s ok fir our needs. Need two people to put together Is best. Great buy. I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Shocked and Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two chairs recently. Like other customers the back of the chair does not align with the drilled holes. It’s as if, I received the wrong base/or back. A pain assembling the legs and base for the back not to fit. Will be returning both of chairs. Waste of time and money. .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for tall bars, Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I may have already written a review, but I can't find it. I was going to correct it anyway. We bought two of these stools, because we have a very tall bar, and some wide people who want to be comfortable. Our original purchase had one stool that could not be correctly put together because of an engineering/mechanical fault. When I contacted the company, they worked with me, and continued to work with me until we had a replacement stool. We love the stools,and the customer service is A+.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Glynn

customer_reviews.title: A great heavy duty big stool
customer_reviews.text: Great great chair! It’s big it’s tall and it’s extremely well-made. Every screw has Loctite on it the nuts that they use are locknuts, and everything is perfect. This is a high-grade stool and I would gladly buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BIG
customer_reviews.text: Very large chair. Swivel is not smooth and requires effort. Was a real pain to assemble and pieces didn't fit together well. Can feel sway when sitting on it due to having to bend parts during assembly to fit (the parts did NOT fit together well). They look nice though. Still waiting for the second one to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: James E Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very very w3el made. Great instructions! Easy to follow but not easy to do. So you need patience and determination. But this is a gorgeous barstool that will be a very nice accent piece of furniture. Very sturdy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Redhead

customer_reviews.title: Well built!
customer_reviews.text: Nice stool is a bit on the larger side of most stools I've owned previously easy to assemble every thing bolts together but seems strong overall I like them I wouldn't use for a small breakfast bar or small island
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Full size/comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are really great stools. It takes two people to put together, I would recommend. Nice a big and sturdy. They are a bit stiff for rotating around but as you use them they get better. Hard to find this siize of chairs. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ccattss

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable feet a huge plus!!!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are wonderful!!! Very easy to put together, sturdy for my height and weight and the detail is impressive...nothing cheap about them. Note: I bought a table that was 40” high, however due to how thick the table top was I’m having to raise the table 1.5” so that when the chairs swivel, they can go under the table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy stool
customer_reviews.text: Nice bar stool. although i put them together without assistance, an extra pair of hands would help holding part during assembly. Fully assembled, the stools are very good looking and are solid. Something under the feet might be needed depending on the type of floor they are on.
customer_reviews.author: Bob M

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THEM!!! EXCELLENT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love these chairs!!! Worth the money!!! Worth it!!!! Quality and quick shipping!!! My 12- year is put them together!
customer_reviews.author: Jimeka Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to put together (I put together 4 in a few hours). They are nice and sturdy. Seats are nice and wide. I get complements on them frequently. While they are comfortable, I do find that I cannot lean back in them very well as I am only 5’1”. Overall, they are a great buy! I am happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice If Not Damaged!
customer_reviews.text: Nice chairs except one must have been damaged prior to shipping. Would really appreciate some sort of compensation!
customer_reviews.author: Beth W.

customer_reviews.title: Strudy, Comfy, Easy, and Seller is GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Just got my second set of chairs. I had accidentally ordered 24" tall bar stools and this company took them back and sent me these 30" tall bar stools. They assemble easy. I cut one of the end off of one of the allen wrenches and put it in the drill to make it easier to assemble. Took about 15 minutes with 2 people. Set your drill to a low torque setting as not to snap off screw head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big and Strong!
customer_reviews.text: If you want a big chair this is a big chair. Sturdy, heavy not easy to move around. But I love it. Great stool for my over 300 pound 6’5 husband. Was almost too tall for him!
customer_reviews.author: Regretta

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: Pictures do not do this stool justice! It is beautiful! It took a minute or two to assemble but it was worth it. It's very high quality and looks perfect in our kitchen. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: NINO

customer_reviews.title: The bar stool looks great. It is very heavy and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The bar stool looks great. It is very heavy and sturdy. We bought them for outside use and I don't expect people will be sitting in them for long lengths of time. This is a good thing since the stools are not comfortable. The back is pushed up over the bottom cushion and creates a very straight back to lean on. I don't know why they did this since the bottom cushion is very ample and didn't need to be crowded. I like the looks of them and I'm going to keep them, but I really cannot recommend them for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Killeen

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like pictures! I was super nervous about quality. They are super sturdy and made well. They were a little difficult for my boyfriend to put together but he did it alone in no time. I was extremely pleased with how these looked in person! They are really nice and look expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinespeace

customer_reviews.title: Great, High Quality Item
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three. This item is of high quality and the customer reviews for this product are very accurate. To save substantial time during assembly, nip off curve/short-end of hex key and use remaining long-end of hex key with hand drill (be careful not to over-tighten). I assembled all three in less than an hour, otherwise it would have taken me 2-3 hours to assemble all three (Per barstool: 16 hex screws for leg assembly, 4 hex bolts for back support assembly, 4 hex bolts/4 hex screws for 2 arm support assembly-Most in tough spots for hand tightening). I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon L. Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chairs
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these chairs are beautiful! The only thing is, get ready to spend a lot of time building them. But once you are done they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Karlito

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a pain to assemble
customer_reviews.text: They seem sturdy and look as pictured but they are a pain in the butt to put together the holes don't line up well but it will fit if you leave everything loose until all nuts and bolts are put in the holes I bought 5 and have only got 2 put together due to getting frustrated but once they are together they are nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Stackerbill

customer_reviews.title: Oustanding buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great chairs for the price. They are solid chairs with a nice large and firm seat. You won't go wrong with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: T&D

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Larger and bulkier than the picture indicates. Pretty ugly also. I am being charged a 20% restock fee because what we received did not look like the picture. Well, it sort of did - the picture just does not show how bulky it is.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the arm rests. They are flimsy, the chairs are large and bulky, for me it seemed like a waste of space when I can get 6 normal size stools comfortably where 4 of this stool can be.
customer_reviews.author: delta stuff

customer_reviews.title: Solid for the money
customer_reviews.text: Like many folk, I’ve searched for a nice bar chair with armrest and this is it. I did receive the wrong size initially and Amazon made it right as always. I’m 6ft 225 and these provide great comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Love the copper accents
customer_reviews.text: My husband is building a Scottish bar. We are doing a copper theme through out. This chair will match perfectly. It is very comfortable but does take some time putting together. Always nice to have two sets of hands to put together.
customer_reviews.author: lisadeew

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are solid chairs with harden hardware that will not stripe out when you assemble the chairs. We are very happy with the quality and the comfort.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Asset to my Bar
customer_reviews.text: I love these Big and Tall Stools. They are sturdy, the color is beautiful, the design give my bar a high-end look. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The stools are very nice. The seat cushion is wide. The swivel seems fine. A nice addition to our bar. We ordered 4 however we had to return one because the seat cushion was damaged. The company said that they did not have a replacement part for it. It worked out fine because 3 stools fit perfectly in our space.
customer_reviews.author: december12

customer_reviews.title: Just What We Needed!
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are perfect for my kitchen counter that is higher than 40 inches from the floor. They are more like chairs than stools. The seats are wide and comfortable as are the backs and armrests. I had to use my own tools to put them together although tools were provided. They are study and a great addition to my kitchen/great room area.
customer_reviews.author: Housie

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for the price. Love them. Large seating for heavy guests. They will sit comfortable in this chair
customer_reviews.author: Tara Hollins

customer_reviews.title: This bar stool should be in front of your bar!
customer_reviews.text: Great bar stool, very sturdy and comfortable . This bar stool will look good in front of any bar!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are a very nice size barstool and seem like the quality is very good but my only problem the seat looks brown in picture it's actually an rust color not brown!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C

customer_reviews.title: Too Tall!
customer_reviews.text: This stool was too large for the breakfast bar area so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: EnJoyce

customer_reviews.title: Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy stool. Took about 30 minutes to assemble. Would have been less had I not used two regular washers by mistake at one point rather than one and a lock washer and had to go back and find out where. Instructions were clear.
customer_reviews.author: desertrat65

customer_reviews.title: These are good sturdy chairs
customer_reviews.text: These are good sturdy chairs, however the right arm rest holes were drilled backwards, I had to drill a new hole in order to make it work. Bring Manufacturing back to America where they know how to read a drawing.
customer_reviews.author: Chester Sudina

customer_reviews.title: Million Dollar Stools
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these stools. The price was great. They make my bar area look a million bucks!!!
customer_reviews.author: DrMyles007

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, look great
customer_reviews.text: Nice barstools but I dislike assembly. Luckily hubby was here with an impact drill or it would’ve taken me forever. They look great in our rustic cabin. Very sturdy and love the patina finish.
customer_reviews.author: tina pawelek

customer_reviews.title: A real find...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for the new kitchen and they look mah-velous baby. Well designed and fabricated with more than ample comfort for a bar-stool. Great price too. Think I'll order a couple more...
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Cushion seems to be wearing in already, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: christine green

customer_reviews.title: Big comfortable stools!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, use your own tools though. I have Allen wrench attachments with my electric screwdriver and also used a smaller crescent wrench and or pliers to hold the nuts. They look fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Girl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs. They are perfect for the breakfast area. Well worth the wait. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: If you're a bigger person like myself (6'3, 250, and need to drop a few lbs) you are going to love these seats.
customer_reviews.author: Chet

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stool nut---
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful stool but it is not 24 inches high it is more like 30. It was hard for me to but together but I am 74. After it was assembled I put next to the counter and was really upset. I would return it if I could but I am not taking it apart and trying to repackage it. Going to call to see if anyone has an option for me.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Crane

customer_reviews.title: Are we sure this isn't a throne!?
customer_reviews.text: Chair is awesome! Way taller than I expected and I am 5 9 LOL had to jump up on this thing! Its higher than my counter but guess I should have realized it was for big and tall HAHA very sturdy and its gorgeous! Are we sure its not a throne!?
customer_reviews.author: Arus Threepersons

customer_reviews.title: How do I contact seller
customer_reviews.text: How do I contact seller? The pieces that screw in the bottom are cracking. I need replacements ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Missing significant number of hardware pieces
customer_reviews.text: Update:after submitting below review and contacting Amazon, they immediately resolved the issue so it is only fair that I change my review from one star to five. Thank you Amazon!! —————— I ordered 4 of these and successfully put together the first two with no issues. The third box doesn’t have enough hardware. ALL of the bags except bag A are missing so many pieces of hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Handan

customer_reviews.title: Can't find them cheaper!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs look great with the matching Table I found elsewhere at a better price. My ornate chess set I found on Overstock is a perfect combo.
customer_reviews.author: Cyril

customer_reviews.title: Very very nice chairs
customer_reviews.text: These were very very nice chairs unfortunately they were too tall for my island so I had to return them, but once assembled it was a quality piece. Check your measurements buyers.
customer_reviews.author: nat

customer_reviews.title: Great stools!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn’t like is the directions were not detailed enough. It requires six hands to actually put them together, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Joy A.Tillman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy chair
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy. Easy to assemble and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these!! I looked long and hard for barstools that had just the right look, as well as arms (for when the grandkids are here), and would hold adult-sized bodies, as well. These are just beautiful and fit my needs!!
customer_reviews.author: L French

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: They are Beautiful and look amazing in my kitchen. I recommend these barstools to anyone. They take 2 people to assemble and it takes a little time, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's tall!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was really to tall for the island where we needed a bar stool. It does fit a big man well
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ash

customer_reviews.title: installation not that difficult
customer_reviews.text: This bar stool is a great bargain,easy to assemble and a great addition to my man cave.
customer_reviews.author: camaroman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Chairs
customer_reviews.text: Very Pretty and easy to put together but some parts are missing for the arms
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. E

customer_reviews.title: Refund time inaccurate.
customer_reviews.text: Part damaged. Received product Sept. 28, 2020. No REFUND YET!!
customer_reviews.author: Betty white

customer_reviews.title: Big and Tall comfort...This is it!!!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are made very well. Assembly was easy but I would recommend having 2 people. Very stylist and love the color. Wide, very comfortable and perfect for the big and tall. This was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The quality looks very nice unfortunately I didn't realize how much was involved in ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality looks very nice unfortunately I didn't realize how much was involved in putting it together and being a single person I was not able to get it done before I had to leave. I wanted the stools for my part-time condo and they got there only two days before my departure and it was too complicated to assemble them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just don’t want anyone else to have to buy parts
customer_reviews.text: My chair must have been a return it has missing an stripped screws nuts an bolts.An the metal is scratch up some.I went an bought all new screws an stuff.So I could put together.An the box was not torn up.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria B.

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The chair is very strong and sturdy. It is well made and beautiful. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Blissful Life

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our new house and they are great. Comfy and can withstand larger people. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: CindyB

customer_reviews.title: Great for someone needing a larger chair
customer_reviews.text: Very large chair. Had to return, too big for our breakfast bar. Arms hit counter top. Great for someone needing a larger chair. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Anniece

customer_reviews.title: Love these chairs
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these chairs ,thought they were a little shorter but beautiful chair .looks very elegant ,very easy to assemble. I did it by myself first chair took some time learning after that had them to together quickly
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Look at buying “used”
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed! I bought this item “used with damage” and, honestly, besides not having proper tools instructions (which I didn’t expect to be included anyway) the barstool looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Arkansassie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bar Stools
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these, took me about 1.5 hours per chair to assemble. Very sturdy and look super nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine A Burnett

product_meta.title: Powell Company Big and Tall Copper Stamped Back Barstool with Arms Bar Stool, Bronze
product_meta.description: The Big & Tall Copper Stamped Back Bar Stool with Arms is designed to suit people large and small. The plush upholstered seat is generous in size, providing optimal comfort. The stamped back adds visual interest and appeal to the stool, while the curved arms and legs keep the piece from becoming too masculine. Perfect for adding to a kitchen counter, island or high-top table.
feature_bullets: Designed for people large and small. Seat height: 30 inches, seat width: 19 inches.
Generous sized seat. Comfortably accommodate people of all sizes.
Great for a home bar or kitchen island.
Swivel Seat for comfort and ease of use.
Bronze Finish; Fabric: Faux leather - 100% polyester

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars385 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
